name: Eagle
description:
A golf game that will give you some hours of fun.

-Eagle has two game modes with more than fourty levels in both modes.

-Eagle has fun enviroments for playing, like a forest, a park, a house, a city, near a river, an island, an mountain and so on.

-Eagle has a local multiplayer to play with a friend.

-Eagle has also singleplayer to play if you are alone.

-You can play 5 minutes and stop, you wont need one hour to finish a match.

-Eagle doesn't need a great device.

-Eagle doesn't need internet connection.

-Eagle doesn't need the best mobile or pc for playing.
